title: Client crashing on mac after chmpion select
body: When I go out of champion select, after we all lock in, the timer counts down and when the window with everyone's champion and their ping opens, it is just black. anyone know how to fix?

replies.body:
Crashing after champ select is typically caused by the client being unable to properly connect to the server. The Mac client is particularly sensitive to any short drops in connection. The guide that *Rineyy* linked in this thread is a good starting point in troubleshooting this issue. Additionally, a common workaround for this issue is to spam the **ENTER or RETURN** key after your client begins loading into the match.

Let me know if you continue to have issues after working through that guide.
